text: wolves are absolute experts when it

work there's a rope experiment in order

dependent on people they don't really

are still wonderful and they can do lots

surf skate herd sheep even sniff for

the wolf pair succeeded time after time
the dogs were lucky to do at once the

how about these rooks sorry dogs now
